snippet: A White House spokesman condemned comments made by President Mohamed Morsi before he took office, saying such “rhetoric is not acceptable.”
abstract: White House condemns anti-Semitic comments made by Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi before he took office, saying such rhetoric is not acceptable in democratic Egypt.
lead_paragraph: A White House spokesman condemned comments made by President Mohamed Morsi before he took office, saying such “rhetoric is not acceptable.”

headline.seo: U.S. Criticizes Egypt’s Leader for Anti-Semitic Remarks
headline.main: U.S. Criticizes Egypt’s Leader for Anti-Semitic Remarks
headline.print_headline: U.S. Criticizes Egypt’s Leader for Anti-Semitic Remarks
